Plot
All the worldwide children of less than nine years fall in coma at the same time. 
Ten years later, Tom Russel is released from prison after killing a man in a fight, 
and returns to his home town, more specifically to his older brother home, who has 
a son in coma. Tom intends to rebuild his life, but his ex-wife Jean Raynor is hurt 
and does not want to see him. Along the night, all the children wake up in a 
violent mood, killing all the adults. A group of survivors, led by Tom and Jean, 
try to escape to the safety of a base located 60 km outside the town.
